title: i bought a skin with orange essence and now the game is acting like i don't own it
body: i had an Annie in wonderland skin shard and i bought it with orange essence and now the game is saying it's unavailable even though it took my orange essence

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DankWalrus2,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=XNKc3idE,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-05-06T23:42:18.977+0000)
>
> i had an Annie in wonderland skin shard and i bought it with orange essence and now the game is saying it's unavailable even though it took my orange essence

Hey Walrus, can you restart the League Client and see if it shows up? If it doesn't, can you try a Custom Game and see if she's available to use? I'm taking a look at the account--and assuming I'm looking at the correct one--you should have Annie in Wonderland available to you.

If you're still having issues, please reach out to my colleagues through the Support Site to see what may be causing this weird issue where you cannot use a skin your account has: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
As Son Golin said, sometimes skins don't show up in your collection after you unlock them in Hextech Crafting. If you relog into League, it should probably show up.
Was this the bug I saw in the tracker earlier? I.e., it's been fixed?
